name: Vegan Zucchini Noodles with Chickpeas and Zucchini Blossoms
author: Rita
summary: This is a quick and nutritious vegan main. You can leave out the zucchini blossoms since they are only in season for a short while, but if you can find them, make sure to use them!
ingredients: 2 medium zucchini, cut into noodles with a spiralizer
12  zucchini blossoms, pistils removed, cut into strips
½ cup canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed
6  fresh basil leaves, cut into strips, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over low heat and cook garlic until softened, about 10 minutes
Add zucchini and zucchini blossoms; mix well with olive oil
Add chickpeas and stir to combine
Season with salt and stir in basil
